name: shlubi
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wb(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wss(co(c0, chj, c2), c1))

stmt.origin: mp3an(wb(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wss(co(c0, chj, c2), c1)), wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c2, csh), wcel(c1, cch))
stmt.pretty: mp3an(((c0 ⊆ c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c1)↔(c0[vH]c2)⊆ c1), c0 ∈ SH, c2 ∈ SH, c1 ∈ CH)

body.origin:
|- wb(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wss(co(c0, chj, c2), c1))
-| wcel(c0, csh)
-| wcel(c2, csh)
-| wcel(c1, cch)
-| wi(w3a(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c2, csh), wcel(c1, cch)), wb(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wss(co(c0, chj, c2), c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wss(co(c0, chj, c2), c1))
-| wcel(c0, csh)
-| wcel(c2, csh)
-| wcel(c1, cch)
-| wi(w3a(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c2, csh), wcel(c1, cch)), wb(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wss(co(c0, chj, c2), c1)))

body.origin: |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c2, csh), wcel(c1, cch)), wb(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wss(co(c0, chj, c2), c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wss(co(c0, chj, c2), c1))
-| wcel(c0, csh)
-| wcel(c2, csh)
-| wcel(c1, cch)

comment: Hilbert lattice join is the least upper bound (among Hilbert lattice elements) of two subspaces. (Contributed by NM, 11-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
